name: multi-vendor-marketplace-lite-for-woocommerce
author: webkul
description: This plugin converts the WooCommerce store into multi-vendor store. Using this plugin, the seller can manage the inventory, shipment, seller profile page, seller collection page and much more.

scripts.make-pot: php -d xdebug.max_nesting_level=512 $(which wp) i18n make-pot --exclude="node_modules/,languages/,wk_caching/,.gitignore,.gitmodules,.gulpfile.js,.git,.webpack.config.js,package.json,package-lock.json,phpcs.xml,phpmd.xml,license.txt,readme.txt,assets/,$npm_package_name/" --headers='{"Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/multi-vendor-marketplace-lite-for-woocommerce/", "language-team":"LANGUAGE <EMAIL@ADDRESS>"}' . languages/wk-marketplace.pot
scripts.zip-plugin: mkdir -p $npm_package_name && cp -r assets/ helper/ inc/ includes/ languages/ templates/ vendor/ wk_caching/ woocommerce/ class-wk-caching-core-loader.php readme.txt $npm_package_name.php $npm_package_name && zip -r $npm_package_name.zip $npm_package_name -x **/wk_caching/.gitignore -x **/wk_caching/.git -x **/wk_caching/composer.lock -x **/wk_caching/phpcs.xml -x **/wk_caching/composer.json && rm -r $npm_package_name
scripts.zip-for-wp-repo: npm run submodules && npm run caching-composer && npm run zip-plugin
